title: labels_disjoint
description: Subtracts one label file from another, effectively creating a label that represents label1 minus label2

label2.title: Label 2
label2.description: Second label file to subtract from the first (e.g., rh.V1.label).

outputname.title: Output Name
outputname.description: Output label file name where the result will be saved (e.g., rh.Occ_V1.label).
